Rich Text

Rich text tiles can be used in your layout to have freeform content that can be edited through the tinyMCE editor. Code entered here is sanitized before displaying, so some code may be unexpectedly stripped out.

Navigation

Display a navigation tree for the site, relative to the current item.

Embed

Enter a media URL (such as a YouTube link) to display the related video. See https://noembed.com/#supported-sites for a list of supported sites that can be used with this tile.

Title

Display the title of the current item.

Summary

Display the description from the current item.

Text

Display the main text field from the current item.

Discussion

Displays comments associated with the current item.

Document Byline

Shows the document byline with author name and date.

Related Items

Display the related items selected in the categorization tab of this item.

Keywords

Display the keywords defined in the categorization tab of this item.

Content Listing

Display the results of a saved search of the site content.

Existing Content

Select an existing page in the site to be displayed within the tile. Various display options are available for which pieces of the content will display.

RSS

Displays an RSS feed in a tile.
